summary: Draco: I was watching this film on the vitellysion you should watch. It's about a mermaid who falls in love with a human prince....
body:
Draco: I was watching this film on the vitellysion you should watch. It's about a mermaid who falls in love with a human prince. So she goes to an octopus like evil witch...
Harry: Are you talking about "The Little Mermaid"?
Draco: Yes! Have you watched it?
Harry: It's a child's film
Draco: Yeah, sure, as if a child would undertand the complexity of a interspecies tranfiguration and the power of a magical contract

blog.name: rickyotaku
blog.title: CPR blog for the Akuma no Riddle fandom
blog.description:
Canadian|idc about which pronouns you use for me|I'm pretty much androgynous|LGBT|Asperger Syndrome|Hufflepuff.
Blog about animes/manga, mainly yuri, and when I say yuri, I mean especially Akuma no Riddle. Also into Symphogear, Danganronpa and Umineko. My fav anime is actually Sailor Moon. I'm a fanfiction writer, you can find me on ff.net (Ricky Otaku) or AO3 (RickyOtaku). Feel free to ask me question or talk to me if you want.

summary: You should totally write the fanfic :) I was thinking: Mizorogi could be the Hagrid equivalent, since he is a biology teacher,...
question: You should totally write the fanfic :) I was thinking: Mizorogi could be the Hagrid equivalent, since he is a biology teacher, and Kaiba could be the Dumbledore equivalent, since he is mysterious (and Dumbledore is a jerk sometimes). What do you think?
answer: Mizorogi could be pretty much the equivalent of every nice teacher (Hagrid and Lupin specifically). As for who Dumbledore equivalent would be, perhaps Kaiba could fit, but I see him more as a regular teacher. But he could be Tokaku’s Dumbledore xD. but if I ever wrote that fic, every character would have their own role, without being 100% a Harry Potter character equivalent.

reblog.comment: Mizorogi could be pretty much the equivalent of every nice teacher (Hagrid and Lupin specifically). As for who Dumbledore equivalent would be, perhaps Kaiba could fit, but I see him more as a regular teacher. But he could be Tokaku’s Dumbledore xD. but if I ever wrote that fic, every character would have their own role, without being 100% a Harry Potter character equivalent.

trail.content_raw: Mizorogi could be pretty much the equivalent of every nice teacher (Hagrid and Lupin specifically). As for who Dumbledore equivalent would be, perhaps Kaiba could fit, but I see him more as a regular teacher. But he could be Tokaku’s Dumbledore xD. but if I ever wrote that fic, every character would have their own role, without being 100% a Harry Potter character equivalent.
trail.content: Mizorogi could be pretty much the equivalent of every nice teacher (Hagrid and Lupin specifically). As for who Dumbledore equivalent would be, perhaps Kaiba could fit, but I see him more as a regular teacher. But he could be Tokaku’s Dumbledore xD. but if I ever wrote that fic, every character would have their own role, without being 100% a Harry Potter character equivalent.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: susiron
blog.title: Always Guilty.
blog.description: I reblog a lot of anime and pretty things. I might post my art here sometimes, but otherwise you'll find it on my other blogs and accounts linked below.

summary: I know it’s often more aesthetically pleasing to put Harry’s scar off to the side so that it can show thru his hair well, but no...
body: I know it’s often more aesthetically pleasing to put Harry’s scar off to the side so that it can show thru his hair well, but no one can convince me that Voldemort’s dramatic ass didn’t purposefully and precisely aim at the direct center of baby Harry’s forehead before casting the killing curse

reblog.comment: I know it’s often more aesthetically pleasing to put Harry’s scar off to the side so that it can show thru his hair well, but no one can convince me that Voldemort’s dramatic ass didn’t purposefully and precisely aim at the direct center of baby Harry’s forehead before casting the killing curse
